newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Prudential Asia names fixed income investment head.
newsitem.headline: Prudential Asia names fixed income investment head.

text.p: Prudential Asia has appointed Albert Cobetto to start up an Asian fixed income investment team, the company said on Tuesday.
Cobetto has been named managing director, Asia public fixed income, of Prudential Investments, it said.
Prior to joining Prudential, Cobetto was director and head of capital markets at Salomon Brothers. Before that, he was with Lehman Brothers in Asia for 10 years.
Prudential Asia is the Asian investment and institutional fund management arm of Prudential Insurance Co of America.
In addition to private equity, the company also invests in public equities and is in the process of setting up a business focusing on infrastructure investments in Asia.
